description: [QakBot](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0650) can check the compromised host for the presence of multiple executables associated with analysis tools and halt execution if any are found.(Citation: Trend Micro Qakbot May 2020)(Citation: ATT QakBot April 2021)

external_references.description: Mendoza, E. et al. (2020, May 25). Qakbot Resurges, Spreads through VBS Files. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
Morrow, D. (2021, April 15). The rise of QakBot. Retrieved September 27, 2021.
